text: (minisune! sækayen tora) pæhædili sadhakayan oba veta pæmini pasuda, oba (islamayehi sthira novi) lessa giyahot (obata danduvam kirimata) niyata vasayenma allah balasampannayeku vasayenda, (obava kumana akarayakin hæsiraviya yutuda yanna hondin dæna sitina) gnanavantayeku vasayenda sitinneya yanna oba sthira vasayen dæna ganu
